description: A military-grade stun grenade or "flashbang".  Use this item to pull the pin and start the fuse.  You will then have five seconds before it detonates with intense light and sound, blinding, deafening, and disorienting anyone nearby.
This stun grenade is active, and will soon detonate with intense light and sound, blinding, deafening, and disorienting anyone nearby.  It may be a good idea to throw it!
A military-grade fragmentation hand grenade.  Use this item to pull the pin and start the fuse.  You will then have five seconds before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.
This fragmentation grenade is active, and will explode any second now.  Better throw it!
